utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how much will you give me to eat this whole jar of olives?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I won’t give you anything, but you’ll owe me 2.95.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Done.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey. I need an atlas! I need an atlas!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why? Do you have a report due?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I have a date with this diplomat I met while I was giving free massages outside the UN and, I don’t know where his country is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, let’s start with the free messages outside the UN.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!! That’s my new thing. I figure bodies at peace, make peace.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! You might just get the first Nobel prize in rubbing. So what country is this guy from?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ick-neck-tree-anis..... There’s a ‘g’ in there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where’s that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: In your atlas!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t have an atlas.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, but wait I do have a globe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hold on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So Pheebs what’s this guy like?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, well he’s very dashing, y'know, and umm, very, very sophisticated, and he doesn’t speak any English, but according to his translator, he totally gets me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ‘Kay, here you go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s a globe and, a pencil sharpener.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, does anybody need anything copied? I’m going down to the Xerox place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, no thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay listen, just give me anything I can make two of.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if you don’t have anything to copy, why are you going down there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, are you just going down there to gawk at that hot girl with the belly button ring again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! You wanna come?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on Chloe! Finish up with your customer first. Come on Chloe! Come on Chloe!!

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, y'know what, we’re having second thoughts about our copying needs. And we’ll need a little more time to think about it.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Chloe, switch with me, there’s some guys here that got a crush on you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, that hurt us.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hi guys. I haven’t seen you since this morning.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well ah, ........y'know.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, what are you guys doing tomorrow night?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Both of us?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Maybe. Does that scare ya?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Relax. It’s just Issac’s D.J.-ing at the Philly. You should come.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’ll be there.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Great. I’ll ah, see ya then.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, rock on.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: He’s says, ‘Walking with you makes this strange city, feel like home.’

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too. Although this city is my home, so. So that’s dumb what I said, don’t tell him I said that. Umm, you make something up. Nice, thank you. This is me. Here.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Your eyes are very pretty.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you, very much! Oh! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: He would like to kiss you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what, you don’t have to do that now. No-no-no-no!! Not him, you don’t! Well the moment’s over.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Oy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See there it is right there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! It’s small.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. But Sergei said it took the Germans six weeks to get all the way across it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So you had fun, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Except for, y'know when you’re on a date and you’re getting along really great but the guy’s translator keeps getting in the way.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is ah, Rach in her room?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, she’s still at work, but she told me to tell you to call her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh what?! Is she gonna cancel on me again?! How can she do this? Doesn’t she know it’s our anniversary?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right ah, Ross, this is the extent of my knowledge on the subject. Call Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s that on the bottom?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s my doodle of a ladybug, with a top hat. She’s fancy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, honey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, there was a disaster in shipping and I’ve got to get this order in. Honey, I’m so sorry, but it looks like I’m gonna be here all night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, do you, well umm, oh how about I come up there?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no-no, no, honey please, I’ve got, I’ve just have so much to deal with.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Anyway, I’m going out with Sergei again tonight, and um, could you come and be the translator’s date? So that when we, it’s time for our alone time, you two could split off. Y'know, he’s really, he’s kinda cute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, well kinda cute, like really kinda cute, or kinda cute like your friend Spackel Back Larry?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, don’t call him that! His name is Spackel Back Harry!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, y'know what, maybe we should get going. I mean what time did Chloe say we should be there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What time is it now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah all right, so we’ll hang out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Hey, remember when she brought up that thing about the three of us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes. Vividly.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She was kidding about that right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I-I think so. Yeah, I-I think so...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: God, that would be weird it that situation presented itself tonight, huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, I mean what, what would we do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She was kidding.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She was.... But y'know what, just in case, maybe we should come up with a set of ground rules.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, for sure. Okay. Probably want the first thing to be, never open your eyes. Y'know, because you don’t want to be doing something and then look up and see something you don’t want to be seeing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Good call, nice one. Hold it!! Hold it! What if me eyes are closed, and, and my hand is out there....

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah!! Okay! Eyes open at all times! Oh, hey, how do we decide where we... y'know each would, y'know be?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right. Right. Well ah, y'know we could flip for it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess, but what’s like heads and what’s tails?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well it you don’t know that, then I don’t want to do this with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, no, I’m looking at a purchase order right here and it clearly states that we ordered the Rivera bikini in a variety of sizes and colours. And.... What does it matter, what I’m wearing?! Can I please speak to your supervisor? Thank you. We’re holding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!! My God, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well you said you couldn’t go out so....

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: You brought a picnic, oh, what a boyfriend. That’s it, on Monday I start wearing make-up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross honey, this is very nice, but, but I-I got a crisis.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but I got cous-cous!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, honey, I’m sorry, I know it’s our anniversary but I told you on the phone I don’t have time to stop.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, you don’t have to stop, I’m invisible, I’m not here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I don’t, hmm... Oh, who approved that order?! Well there is no Mark Robbinson in this office. Get me Mark on the phone!

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: I love Mark. Do you know Mark?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, let me just check that with what I got here, all right see 038 is not the number for this store, 038 is Atlanta. And I...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pepper?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: None for me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay sorry, whew.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry, as I was saying the store number is wrong, and I’m sorry but that’s... Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, that’s a fire. Oh yeah. Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me, I’m sorry, I’m gonna have to call you back, I’ve got a Schemp in my office. What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry. But ah, hey, oh, somebody’s off the phone, how ‘bout a glass of wine by the fire, I could get it going again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross you’re not listening to me, I don’t have time to stop.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on Rach, you don’t have what, ten minutes?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t have ten minutes!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Sophie, does she have ten minutes?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, Ross!!! I told you I don’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don’t yell at me okay, this is the most I’ve seen you all week.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look, I cannot do this right now, okay, I’ve got a deadline, would you just go home, I’ll talk to you later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but wait...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good bye!

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: Actually, that’s our three hole punch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. Look um, about what happened earlier...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, hey, well, I-I completely understand. You were, you were stressed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I was gonna give you a chance to apologise to me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: For what? For letting you throw me out of your office?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You had no right coming down to my office Ross. You do not bring a picnic basket to somebody’s work! Unless maybe they were a park ranger!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well excuse me for wanting to be with my girlfriend on our anniversary, boy what an ass am I.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I told you, I didn’t have the time!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well you never have the time. I mean, I don’t feel like I even have a girlfriend anymore, Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh, Ross what do you want from me? You want me, you want me to quit my job so you can feel like you have a girlfriend?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, but it’d be nice if you realised, it’s just a job!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just a job!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross do you realise this is the first time in my life I’m doing something I actually care about. This is the first time in my life I’m doing something that I’m actually good at. I mean. if you don’t get that...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, hey, I get that, okay, I get that big time. And I’m happy for ya, but I’m tired of having a relationship with your answering machine! Okay, I don’t know what to do anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well neither do I!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is this about Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, it’s not, it’s not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight over and over again, Ross, no, you’re, you’re, you’re making this too hard.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh I’m, I’m making this too hard. Okay, what do you want me to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, I don’t know. Urrrgh! Look, maybe we should take a break.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, fine, you’re right. Let’s ah, let’s take a break, let’s cool off, okay, let’s get some frozen yogart, or something..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. A break from us.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: And the advances in collating in the past five years, I mean we just got in an X-5000, y'know. The X-5000 makes the X-50 look like a T-71.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, it’s the dinosaur guy. Hi, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hi Chloe.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: I want you to met some friends of mine. This guy is my hero, he comes in with some stuff he wants it blown up 400%, we said we don’t do that, and he says you gotta. And y'know what, we did it. And now anytime anybody wants 400, we just say ‘let’s Ross it!’

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And that’s the only colour that comes in.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Yo, Chloe, do you have a quarter for the condom machine?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, what are you doing here? I thought tonight was your big anniversary dinner.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, little change in plans. Ahh, we’re gonna break-up instead.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, and I can also speak a little French. Voulez-vous coucher avec moi ce soir? Why? What did I say?

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Well, you just asked if I wanted to go to bed with you tonight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! No wonder I get such great service at Cafe Maurice.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Knock, knock, knock, knock, hi. Um, could you please tell Sergei that um, I was fascinated by what Boutros Boutros Gali said in the New York Times.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You didn’t say Boutros Boutros Gali.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Boutros Boutros Gali.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: He says he was too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Interesting.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: So I was wondering....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, ah, before you get all talky again, umm, could you also please tell Sergei that I really like his suit.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Eh, he said, thank you very much, he thinks you look very pretty tonight, your hair, golden like the sun. So you're a chef?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m also thinking about opening up my own restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Oh, really.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, can I talk to you behind my menu, please. What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I was having a conversation.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah but, Mischa is so interested in you, that Sergei and I haven’t been able to say two words to each other.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you want me to do? Just sit here silently while you three have a conversation?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That would be great. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Oh, hi. It’s Mark.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: What? Is it my breath?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Sorry, I just thought you were somebody else. Hi!

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Hi. Well, look, I was just gonna leave a message, isn’t tonight your, your big anniversary dinner?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Well, umm.....

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Rach, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: You wanna talk, I mean I can come over?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Really, no, please, please, that’s, that’s okay.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: All right, all right, I’m coming over, and I’m bringing Chinese food.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, I’m not, I’m not hungry.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: It’s for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What can I do? One person wants to break-up, you break-up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, no way! Come on, this is you guys, call her and work it out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh come on, we just had this huge fight, all right, don’t I have to wait a while?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, this isn’t like swimming after you eat, pick up the phone!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know that whole swimming thing is a myth.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, tell that to my Uncle Lenny.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why? What happened to him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing, he’s just really believes in that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, and then, we got into this big, stupid fight. I just, it was awful. I told him he treats me like a park ranger, or something, oh and then I told him I wanted to take a break, I don’t want to take a break.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Wow. I’m sorry. Eggroll?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. And then I called him, and he wasn’t there.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Well, then he’s, he’s probably just, out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank you that’s very helpful, I’m glad you came over.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! It’s me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Oh, I’m so glad you called.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? I’ve been thinking, this is crazy, I mean don’t, don’t you think we can work on this?

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Hey, what do you want to drink?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who’s that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nobody.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Is it okay if I finish the apple juice?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, honey, look he just came over to....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Got it!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, dinosaur guy, look at you, so sad. Come dance.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, that’s okay, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, you don’t have to smile. You just have to dance.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I don’t feel like dancing, I feel like having a drink. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Hey, two beers.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: And the vet said it was time. And so from half a world away, while my Mother held the phone to his ear, I said good bye to my dog,. In seven languages.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. Can I have a tissue?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, sure. I just hope you, hope you don’t accidentally suck it up through your nose and choke on it.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Sergei, would like to apologise for my behaviour tonight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, tell him, apology accepted.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: Oh, he’s unbelievable. I mean for the first time in three years somebody wants to actually want to talk to me, but do you think he would let me enjoy that, no!! You silly diplomat, why don’t you learn some English, Sergei?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me, but umm, isn’t he paying for your dinner?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, the man’s dog just died.

utterance.speaker: Mischa
utterance.content: I have just resigned my post. Would you care to accompany me to the Rainbow Room? I have diplomatic coupons.

utterance.content: It will be my pleasure. My guy has diplomatic coupons. Your guy can’t even say coupons.

utterance.content: Uh, plate?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Plate! Yes, plate.

utterance.speaker: Sergei
utterance.content: Plate. Plate. Plate.

utterance.content: See, we don’t need them.

utterance.speaker: Sergei
utterance.content: Plate?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I like this song.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Well, you’re practically dancing already. Why don’t you just do it over here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no, no.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: What? Are you married? ‘Cause that’s okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, be home, be home, be home, be home, be home, be home. Be home. Be home, be home, be home. Oh, you’re not home.

utterance.content: Still no smile?
